sections.heading: # CLI Reference
sections.prompt: Overview of CLI tool (2-3 paragraphs): Purpose, installation, general usage pattern. Keep factual and concise.

sections.heading: ## Global Options
sections.prompt: Document global flags/options available for all commands (list format). For each option: name, type, default, description. Be precise and complete. Group related options.

sections.heading: ## Commands
sections.prompt: Comprehensive command reference (one subsection per command). For each command document: (1) Synopsis with syntax, (2) Description, (3) All options with types and defaults, (4) Exit codes, (5) Two example usages (basic and advanced). Be thorough and structured. Present in alphabetical order.

sections.heading: ## Configuration Files
sections.prompt: Document configuration file formats (3-4 paragraphs per file type). Cover: file location, format (JSON/YAML/TOML), all available fields with types and defaults, examples. Be complete and precise.

sections.heading: ## Environment Variables
sections.prompt: List all environment variables (table format). Columns: Variable name, Description, Type, Default. Order alphabetically. Include variables that affect behavior.
